text: Breaking and Entering is a 2006 British American romantic crime drama movie directed by Anthony Minghella and starring Jude Law, Juliette Binoche, Robin Wright, Ray Winstone, Anna Chancellor, Martin Freeman. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:2006 crime movies Category:2006 romantic drama movies Category:2000s crime drama movies Category:British romantic drama movies Category:British crime drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Anthony Minghella
title: Breaking and Entering (movie)
